===Etymology===
[[中山]] (an alias of [[w:Sun Yat-sen|Sun Yat-sen]]'s) [[裝]] ([[suit]])
: This type of suit was originally worn by [[w:Sun Yat-sen|Sun Yat-sen]], and as such is still named after him in Chinese. In English, it was named after Mao, because it became so closely associated with [[w:Mao Zedong|Mao]] in the Western imagination.
